name: Shipwreck Adventure (Arix, GraphicEdit, Ian Coulter, MaiGamesDev, HardRain)
name_original: Shipwreck Adventure (Arix, GraphicEdit, Ian Coulter, MaiGamesDev, HardRain)
description:
- About -

Get the treasures the sea keeps in the deep, but beware...

  You are a treasure hunter.

 One day while sailing,  You found a old shipwreck.

  Collect treasures and Avoid traps and Enemies.

 But be careful, The cruel Bling crab is wating for you to come...

-------------

- Control -

  WASD/ZQSD - Move

  Space Bar - Dash

  LMB - Shoot

  ESC - Pause

-------------

- Credit -

  HardRain - Main programmer

  Mai - Designer / programmer

  GraphicEdit - Art

  Arix - Art

  lan Coulter - Music / SFX 

-------------

This Game made for Godot WIld Jam #41
